OpenSim::AbstractJoint

AbstractJoint Class Reference

#include <AbstractJoint.h>

Inheritance diagram for AbstractJoint:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A base class that specifies the interface for a joint.

Author:
Peter Loan
Version:
1.0
